results.deck: Originally formed as "CyberConnect". This Japanese development studio is best known for the .hack RPG series and Naruto Ultimate Ninja fighting games. They also developed the lesser known Little Tail Bronx series, the third of which was Solatorobo for the DS.
results.name: CyberConnect2 Co., Ltd.

game.name: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 2: Phantom Fortress
Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Generations
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All Star Battle

concept.name: Video Game Characters That Play Video Games
Games That Ask You to "Press Start" But Will Accept Other Buttons
Third-Person Adventure Mode in a Fighting Game
